verses.text:
Jesusâ€”and didst thou leave the sky,
To bear our griefs and woe?
And didst thou bleed, and groan, and die,
For rebellious foes?

Well might the heavens with wonder view
A love so strange as thine!
No thoughts of angels ever knew
Compassion so divine.

Is there a heart that will not bend
To thy divine control?
Descend, O sovereign love, descend,
And melt that stubborn soul!

O, may our willing hearts confess
Thy sweet, thy gentle sway!
Give us the blessing of thy grace,
Thy righteous rule obey.
